page.title: 17TRADE
page.content:
There are several shops in this area which provide the basic needs for family life. The biggest{supermarket}is Budgens which was built in 1973.This is the most popular shop in Doddinghurst,its busiest day is Saturday and expects approximately 4,000 customers per week. There are a few other shops of this type, Watsons, Wayside Stores and Junior Stores in Kelvedon Hatch. Some people would like to see a bakery and a D.I.Y shop in the village, although many people would like to see Doddinghurst remaining as a village and stop much more building development.
(CONTINUED ON NEXT PAGE)
